00017 //===============================================================
00018 // boundary classes - define what are inner, boundary (Neumann)
00019 // and extended boundary (Dirichlet)elements
00020 //===============================================================
00021 
00022 // function defining the inner elements
00023 template<typename GV, typename RF, typename PGMap>
00024 class Regions
00025   : public Dune::PDELab::GridFunctionBase<
00026         Dune::PDELab::GridFunctionTraits<GV,RF,1,Dune::FieldVector<RF,1> >,
00027         Regions<GV,RF,PGMap> >
00028 {
00029 public:
00030 
00031   typedef Dune::PDELab::GridFunctionTraits<GV,RF,1,Dune::FieldVector<RF,1> > Traits;
00032   typedef Dune::PDELab::GridFunctionBase<Dune::PDELab::GridFunctionTraits<GV,RF,1,
00033       Dune::FieldVector<RF,1> >, Regions<GV,RF,PGMap> > BaseT;
00034 
00035   // constructor
00036   Regions(const GV& gv_, const PGMap& pg_) : gv(gv_), mapper(gv), pg(pg_) {}
00037 
00038   // evaluate the inner elements
00039   inline void evaluate (const typename Traits::ElementType& e,
00040                         const typename Traits::DomainType& x,
00041                         typename Traits::RangeType& y) const
00042   {
00043     // retrieve element index and corresponding material index on level 0
00044     typename GV::template Codim<0>::EntityPointer ep(e);
00045     while (ep->level() != 0) ep = ep->father();
00046     const int ei              = mapper.map(e);
00047     const int physgroup_index = pg[ei];
00048 
00049     // evaluate physical group map and set values accordingly
00050     switch ( physgroup_index )
00051     {
00052       default : y = 1.0;  break; // only one material here
00053     }
00054   }
00055 
00056   inline const typename Traits::GridViewType& getGridView() { return gv; }
00057 
00058 private:
00059 
00060   const GV& gv;
00061   const Dune::MultipleCodimMultipleGeomTypeMapper<GV,P0Layout> mapper;
00062   const PGMap& pg;
00063 };

00066 
00071 template<typename GV, typename PGMap>
00072 class BCType : public Dune::PDELab::BoundaryGridFunctionBase<
00073         Dune::PDELab::BoundaryGridFunctionTraits<GV,int,1,
00074         Dune::FieldVector<int,1> >,BCType<GV,PGMap> >
00075 {
00076 public:
00077 
00078   typedef Dune::PDELab::BoundaryGridFunctionTraits<
00079           GV,int,1,Dune::FieldVector<int,1> > Traits;
00080 
00082   BCType (const GV& gv_, const PGMap& pg_) : gv(gv_), pg(pg_) {}
00083 
00085   template<typename I>
00086   inline void evaluate (I& i, const typename Traits::DomainType& xlocal,
00087                         typename Traits::RangeType& y) const
00088   {
00089 
00090     // use physical index to determine B.C.
00091     // values are specified in .geo file
00092     // 0 is for Dirichlet surfaces
00093     // 1 for Neumann
00094     // 2 for iPBS
00095 
00096     int physgroup_index = pg[i.intersection().boundarySegmentIndex()];
00097     //std::cout << "Set boundary type" << physgroup_index << " at " << i.geometry().center() << std::endl;
00098     switch ( physgroup_index )
00099     {
00100       case 0:   y = 1.0;  break; // Set Dirichlet
00101       case 1:   y = 0.0;  break; // Set Neumann
00102       case 2:   y = 0.0;  break; // Set Neumann for iPBS
00103       default : y = 1.0;  break; // Default is Dirichlet
00104     }
00105     return;
00106   }
00107 
00109   inline const GV& getGridView () {return gv;}
00110 
00111 private:
00112 
00113   const GV&    gv;
00114   const PGMap& pg;
00115 };

00119 // This sets the potential to zero (Dirichlet B.C.) at the system outer boundaries
00120 
00121 template<typename GV, typename RF, typename PGMap>
00122 class BCExtension
00123   : public Dune::PDELab::GridFunctionBase<Dune::PDELab::
00124            GridFunctionTraits<GV,RF,1,Dune::FieldVector<RF,1> >,
00125            BCExtension<GV,RF,PGMap> >
00126 {
00127 public :
00128 
00129   typedef Dune::PDELab::GridFunctionTraits<GV,RF,1,Dune::FieldVector<RF,1> > Traits;
00130   typedef typename GV::IntersectionIterator IntersectionIterator;
00131 
00133   BCExtension(const GV& gv_, const PGMap& pg_) : gv(gv_), pg(pg_) {}
00134 
00136   inline void evaluate (const typename Traits::ElementType& e,
00137                         const typename Traits::DomainType& xlocal,
00138                         typename Traits::RangeType& y) const
00139   {
00140     // Set value for potential at outer domain boundaries
00141       y = 0.0;                          // set domain boundary
00142     return;
00143   }
00144 
00146   inline const GV& getGridView() { return gv; }
00147 
00148 private :
00149 
00150   const GV& gv;
00151   const PGMap& pg;
00152 };

00156 
00157 // function for defining radiation and Neumann boundary conditions
00158 
00159 template<typename GV, typename RF, typename PGMap>
00160 class BoundaryFlux
00161   : public Dune::PDELab::BoundaryGridFunctionBase<
00162            Dune::PDELab::BoundaryGridFunctionTraits<GV,RF,1,
00163            Dune::FieldVector<RF,1> >, BoundaryFlux<GV,RF,PGMap> >
00164 {
00165 public:
00166 
00167   typedef Dune::PDELab::BoundaryGridFunctionTraits<
00168           GV,RF,1,Dune::FieldVector<RF,1> > Traits;
00169   typedef typename Traits::GridViewType::Grid::ctype ctype;
00170 
00171   // constructor
00172   BoundaryFlux(const GV& gv_, const PGMap& pg_) : gv(gv_), pg(pg_), mapper(gv) {}
00173 
00174   // evaluate flux boundary condition
00175   template<typename I>
00176   inline void evaluate(I& i, typename Traits::RangeType& y,
00177                        std::vector<double>& fluxContainer) const
00178   {
00179     // use physical index to determine B.C.
00180     // values are specified in .geo file
00181     // 0 is for Dirichlet surfaces
00182     // 1 for Neumann
00183     // 2 for iPBS
00184 
00185     int physgroup_index = pg[i.intersection().boundarySegmentIndex()];
00186     switch ( physgroup_index )
00187     {
00188       case 1:   y = 0.0;  break; // Set Neumann
00189       case 2:   // Set Neumann for iPBS
00190                 {
00191                   // TODO: This is a temporally bugfic !!!
00192                   if (fabs(i.geometry().center().vec_access(0)) < (sysParams.get_sphere_pos() + sysParams.get_radius())  &&  fabs(i.geometry().center().vec_access(0)) > (sysParams.get_sphere_pos() - sysParams.get_radius()))
00193                     y = fluxContainer[mapper.map(*i.inside())];
00194                    else y = 0.0;
00195                   break;
00196                 }
00197       default : y = 0.0;  break;
00198     }
00199     return;
00200   }
00201 
00202 private:
00203 
00204   const GV&    gv;
00205   const PGMap& pg;
00206   const Dune::MultipleCodimMultipleGeomTypeMapper<GV,P0Layout> mapper;
00207 };

00210 // ============================================================================
00211 // function for defining radiation and Neumann boundary conditions for reference solution!!!
00212 
00213 template<typename GV, typename RF, typename PGMap>
00214 class RefBoundaryFlux
00215   : public Dune::PDELab::BoundaryGridFunctionBase<
00216            Dune::PDELab::BoundaryGridFunctionTraits<GV,RF,1,
00217            Dune::FieldVector<RF,1> >, RefBoundaryFlux<GV,RF,PGMap> >
00218 {
00219 public:
00220 
00221   typedef Dune::PDELab::BoundaryGridFunctionTraits<
00222           GV,RF,1,Dune::FieldVector<RF,1> > Traits;
00223   typedef typename Traits::GridViewType::Grid::ctype ctype;
00224 
00225   // constructor
00226   RefBoundaryFlux(const GV& gv_, const PGMap& pg_) : gv(gv_), pg(pg_) {}
00227 
00228   // evaluate flux boundary condition
00229   template<typename I, typename E>
00230   inline void evaluate(I& i, E& e,
00231                        typename Traits::RangeType& y) const
00232   {
00233     // use physical index to determine B.C.
00234     // values are specified in .geo file
00235     // 0 is for Dirichlet surfaces
00236     // 1 for Neumann
00237     // 2 for iPBS
00238 
00239     int physgroup_index = pg[i.intersection().boundarySegmentIndex()];
00240     switch ( physgroup_index )
00241     {
00242       case 1:   y = 0.0;  break; // Set Neumann
00243       case 2:   {// Set Neumann for Reference
00244                 if (fabs(i.geometry().center().vec_access(0)) < (sysParams.get_sphere_pos() + sysParams.get_radius())
00245                  && fabs(i.geometry().center().vec_access(0)) > (sysParams.get_sphere_pos() - sysParams.get_radius()))
00246                 y = 1.0 * sysParams.get_charge_density()  * sysParams.get_bjerrum();
00247                 break;}
00248       default : 
00249          {
00250                 y = 0.0;  
00251                 std::cerr << "IPBS WARNING:\tCould not evaluate flux B.C. Will use 0." 
00252                           << std::endl;
00253          }
00254     }
00255     return;
00256   }
00257   
00258   private:
00259 
00260   const GV&    gv;
00261   const PGMap& pg;
00262 };
